fields.summary: Android: Scrolling large tables results in a stuttered scroll as the scroll slows down

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

fields.description:
I am using a table view, row consisting of different images and labels and few buttons.
Scrolling works fine on ipad and iphone, but issue is with android.
fields.summary: Table View scroll not so smooth on Android

comments.body: This is a known issue, and the linked JIRA has been escalated further. I'm not closing at duplicate, but as "Needs more info", there's a chance this could be re-opened if this issue is filled in as we expect - like a test case.
